  • Method Details

    • get_instance

      public static GameManager get_instance()
      The get_instance function is a static function that returns the singleton instance of GameManager. If no instance exists, it creates one and returns it.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of the gamemanager class

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player player)
      The addPlayer function adds a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      player - Add a new player to the game

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      The startGame function is called when the game is ready to begin. It sets the gameStarted boolean to true, and then fills each player's hand with 7 cards.

    • addScore

      public void addScore(int playerId, int score)
      The addScore function adds the score to the player's current score.
      Parameters:
      playerId - int Identify which player to add the score to
      score - int Add a score to the player's total score

    • getPlayers

      public HashMap<Integer,Player> getPlayers()
      The getPlayers function returns a HashMap of all the players in the game.
      Returns:
      A hashmap of type integer and player

    • addTile

      public void addTile(int id)
      The addTile function adds a tile to the player's hand.
      Parameters:
      id - int Identify the player who is adding a tile to their hand

    • fillHand

      public void fillHand(int id)
      The fillHand function is used to fill the hand of a player when they have less than 7 tiles.
      Parameters:
      id - int Identify which player's hand is being filled

    • clearHand

      public void clearHand(int playerId)
      The clearHand function is used to clear the hand of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - int Identify which player's hand is being cleared
